alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:24AM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Herkimer County north of the Thruway and Northern Fulton Counties. In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties above 1000 feet elevation. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer
